Uses of Interface
org.apache.zookeeper.metrics.MetricsProvider

  • Packages that use MetricsProvider 
    Package Description
    org.apache.zookeeper.metrics.impl  
    org.apache.zookeeper.server
    ZooKeeper server theory of operation

    • Uses of MetricsProvider in org.apache.zookeeper.metrics.impl

      Classes in org.apache.zookeeper.metrics.impl that implement MetricsProvider 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultMetricsProvider
      Default implementation of MetricsProvider.
      It does not implement a real hierarchy of contexts, but metrics are flattened in a single namespace.
      It is mostly useful to make the legacy 4 letter words interface work as expected.
      class  NullMetricsProvider
      This is a dummy MetricsProvider which does nothing.
      Fields in org.apache.zookeeper.metrics.impl declared as MetricsProvider 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static MetricsProvider NullMetricsProvider.INSTANCE
      Instance of NullMetricsProvider useful for tests.
      Methods in org.apache.zookeeper.metrics.impl that return MetricsProvider 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static MetricsProvider MetricsProviderBootstrap.startMetricsProvider(String metricsProviderClassName, Properties configuration)
